reviews.text: I have been here twice so far. Never disappointed. Always ordered steaks though.
Super place with perfectly baked steak!
I am sure here is mostly tasty steaks. Highly recommend this place for meat lovers!

Pricey but fantastic. There was no waiting time even though it was lunch time. The staff is really nice and helpful. They offered English menus right away and spoke English as well. The place itself is very cozy and has nice details that give it a great character of the wild west. The food was delicious and the portions were really big. Overall it is a great restaurant and I really recommend it!
